page.title: 07***********Brownies.********
page.content:
The Brownie hut was built on chapel land.We have two leaders Tawnieowl and Brownowl;it starts at 5:50 and ends at 7:00 it costs 20p We have got twenty Brownies and they come from Somerby, Twyford,Leesthorpe and Knossington.The hut has a main room, and one kitchen and one outside toilet.We sometimes go tracking and sometimes we go to the play area, but most of the time we stay at the hut and play "Rats and rabbits","Man the ship and man the lifeboat",and lots of other games.Every year we get a lift to Burrough Hill car park and walk over Burrough Hill to Little Dalby to Tawnies house.When we get there we have a picnic and play some games and sing songs.Then we go home.
Written by Rebbeca Simpson aged 10 yrs.
